properties.comment:
Process definition ==================
Name : test Duration :
Process description: Test process
Process parameters: SamplePeriod [s] : Sample period (used in this file) of the time vectors of the process parameters C1_n [rpm] : Rotational speed of the spindle (C1) Z_v [mm/min] : Speed forward of the tool (Z axis) X1_d [mm] : Diameter of the part at the cutting position (adjusted by the X1 axis) X1_ap [mm] : Cutting depth (adjusted by the X1 axis) X1_v [mm/min] : Speed along the X-Axis
